db:abstract.db:para: A Qt module which provides tools for developing for the X11 platform.

db:article.db:para: Qt X11 Extras enables the Qt programmer to write applications for the Linux/X11 platform. Applications developed with Qt can also be deployed across several other desktop and embedded operating systems without having to rewrite the source code.
